title: Roundup: Here’s a closer look at the new green iPhone 13 and iPhone 13 Pro designs
content:
As pre-orders for the green iPhone 13 and alpine green iPhone 13 Pro just opened, some YouTubers and journalists are sharing a closer look at these new mid-cycle iPhone colors. Head below for a closer look at this new design in the real world.

more…

description: YouTubers and journalists are sharing a closer look at the mid-cycle new green iPhone 13 and alpine green iPhone 13 Pro.
